settings.title: Introducing <br class="forMob">Fièra Concealer  Brush
settings.sub_title: Easy to handle and designed to blend with our Concealer quickly and evenly for gorgeous, smooth and long-lasting coverage.
settings.content: Most concealer brushes can be harsh on the skin, fall apart easily and often don’t do the job they’re supposed to. So, we created one that’s soft and gentle on skin, easy to handle, and rapidly blends your concealer for even-toned, gorgeous coverage that lasts.

settings.title: How Fièra <br class="forMob"> Concealer  Brush Works
settings.sub_title: The Fièra Concealer Brush has been specifically designed to work with our luxury concealer formula to give you quick, easy and even application.
settings.content_1: Our brush has been custom designed to help you apply Fièra concealer quickly and evenly
settings.content_2: Easiest way to thoroughly and evenly apply your concealer
settings.content_3: The Concealer brush can be easily cleaned even with heavy use
settings.content_4: We love animals. All Fièra products are 100% cruelty free.

settings.title: Our Fièra Promise
settings.content: Fièra is not your average beauty line. We offer the highest quality products with unstoppable results. Our products focus on delivering innovative science, quality, and convenience. Not just a beauty brand, Fièra is committed to supporting our community through our partnerships with Food Rescue US and Second Harvest by donating a portion of our sales to help feed those in need.
Place a small amount of concealer onto the end of your brush
Gently sweep it over the blemished areas
For dark circles and fine lines, start from the center of your face and move outwards

settings.title: 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
settings.content: We’re so confident you'll love our Fièra products we offer a Hassle-free 30 day Money Back Guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your purchase simply return the items back to us for a full refund.
